entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 a.m. EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
